modName: Crafting (smithing and enchanting) Potion Duration Extender
summary: Extends duration of premade and crafted smithing and enchanting potion effects to 5 minutes.
descriptionHtml:
Crafting Potion Effect Duration Extender by ZHOOL

This mod extends the duration of premade and crafted enchanting and smithing potions from 30 seconds to five minutes.


What's Changed:

Premade crafting potions (eg Enchanter's Elixir) duration extended to 300 seconds (5 minutes)
Fortify Enchanting and Smithing effect duration on the following alchemical ingredients extended to 300 seconds (5 minutes):

blue butterfly wing (ench)
hargraven claw (ench)
snowberries (ench)
spriggan sap (ench + smith)
blisterwort (smith)
glowing mushroom (smith)
sabre cat tooth (smith)

Note: potions crafted by the player prior to installing this mod will not be affected (but premade potions such as Blacksmith's Draught will be).

UNCHANGED DLC INGREDIENTS

enchanting:
ancestor moth wing
chaurus hunter antennae
spawn ash

smithing:
n/a


Auto-calculation of item value is turned off, so all items retain their original value.

IMPORTANT NOTE: Affects vanilla ingredients only! I don't know what will happen if you try to combine dlc ingredients with altered vanilla ones, go ahead and post results!


Conflicts/dependencies: none*

*The Unofficial Skyrim Patch (UKSP) adds two keywords to the sabre cat tooth; my mod doesn't alter that property, and the duration effect is extended when either mod is loaded first (not sure how i'd test the keyword thing), but it comes up red in tes5edit so i figured i should mention it. I'm new.

Installation:

copy to your skyrim\data folder, activate using data files option on skyrim splash screen or your favourite load order finagler. load it after any mods which alter vanilla potions/ingredients.
author: ZHOOL
